comments:
Not sure of exact circumstances... I believe I had just clicked on 
org.apache.xerces in the repo view in order to check it out. other 
background operations were occurring. (*sigh*. sorry)

We are missing null checks when creating remote handles from the local 
workspace. We do ensure that the file is managed but we assumed that this 
meant the parent existed and had sync info. I suspect that the state of the 
sync info changed in the instant between the precheck and the access. This is 
probably not the only place we made this mistake. We'll have to make a pass 
through the code to see if there are similar cases.

I've released a fix for this particular problem in the sense that there will 
no longer be an NPE. However, I want to look through the EclipseSychronizer 
code to ensure that the getFolderSyncInfo isn't fooled by concurrent additions 
and deletions.

This particular problem has been fixed in HEAD. I've opened bug 43822 to 
address the above mentioned concern with the EclipseSynchronizer.
